doc:
Clifton Collins Jr. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clifton_Collins_Jr. 0 Clifton Craig Collins Jr. (born June 16, 1970) is an American actor. Starting in 1990, with small roles in film and on television, Collins gained attention in the role Cpl. Ramon Aguilar, a prisoner “serving” under an imprisoned general played by Robert Redford in the 2001 film The Last Castle. His extensive work includes featured roles in films such as Traffic (2000), Capote (2005), Star Trek (2009) and Pacific Rim (2013). Collins extensive work on television series includes Crisis Center (1997), Thief (2006), which earned him a Primetime Emmy Award nomination, The Event (2010–2011), and Westworld (2016–). Clifton_Craig_Collins_Jr. ( born June_16_,_1970 ) is an_American_actor . Starting in 1990 , with small_roles in film and on television , Collins gained attention in the_role_Cpl._Ramon_Aguilar , a_prisoner “ serving ” under an_imprisoned_general played by Robert_Redford in the_2001_film The_Last_Castle . His_extensive_work includes_featured roles in films such_as Traffic_(_2000_) , Capote_(_2005_) , Star_Trek_(_2009_) and Pacific_Rim_(_2013_) . Collins_extensive_work on television_series includes Crisis_Center_(_1997_) , Thief_(_2006_) , which earned him a_Primetime_Emmy_Award_nomination , The_Event_(_2010 – 2011_) , and Westworld_(_2016 – ) .
